title: Embroidery Sample, late 18th–early 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic thread, metal wire, sequins and paper
Technique: embroidered on voided and uncut supplementary warp pile (velvet)
creditline: Museum purchase from Au Panier Fleuri Fund
description: Floral design embroidered in white silk, silver thread and wire, and silver sequins on a brown ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Embroidery Sample, late 18th–early 19th century.
late 18th–early 19th century. Medium: silk, metallic thread, metal wire, sequins and paper
